mapper.insert: insert into today_news (title, content, cover_img, sequence, is_publish, published_by, published_at, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{coverImg}, #{sequence}, #{isPublish}, #{publishedBy}, #{publishedAt}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
mapper.update: update project set name = #{name}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
